import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './ContactUs.css'; import { submitContactUs } from './Api'; // Import the API function const ContactUs = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', phonenumber: '', // Add the phonenumber field email: '', subject: '', message: '', category: 'general' }); const [submitted, setSubmitted] = useState(false); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { // Call the API function to submit the contact form await submitContactUs(formData); setSubmitted(true); // Reset form after 3 seconds setTimeout(() => { setSubmitted(false); setFormData({ name: '', phonenumber: '', // Reset the phonenumber field email: '', subject: '', message: '', category: 'general' }); }, 3000); } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to submit form', error); } }; return (
{/* Header Section */}

Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you soon.

)}
{/* FAQ Section */}

Frequently Asked Questions

How do I reset my password?

Click on the "Forgot Password" link on the login page and follow the instructions sent to your email.

How can I delete my confession?

Go to your profile, find the confession, and click the delete button. Note that some confessions cannot be deleted after 24 hours.

Is my confession anonymous?

Yes! All confessions are posted anonymously by default unless you choose to reveal your identity.

{/* Social Links */}

Connect With Us

); }; export default ContactUs;
